summary: The implementation covers most requirements with good fidelity to the BuildRequest. Core backend event storage with CRUD operations, frontend views (Calendar with monthly/weekly/daily views, Add/Edit Event, Event Details), theme support, bottom navigation, and notification system are all present. However, there are several gaps: the backend does not use stable storage (no stable variables for persistence across upgrades), the Home screen is missing (only referenced in routing but file not shown), the Settings screen is missing (only referenced in routing), and some styling and animation details may need verification in the truncated files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend must use stable storage for events to persist across canister upgrades
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo uses Map.empty<Text, Event>() which creates a regular (non-stable) variable. No stable variable declarations are present, meaning events will not persist across canister upgrades.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a Home screen component that displays today's date prominently and lists all events scheduled for today
missing_requirements.reason: The Home page component is referenced in routing (frontend/src/App.tsx imports Home from './pages/Home') but the file frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx is not included in the diff, indicating it may be missing or was omitted from the summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a Settings screen with options for theme toggle, notification preferences, and cloud sync placeholder
missing_requirements.reason: The Settings page component is referenced in routing (frontend/src/App.tsx imports Settings from './pages/Settings') but the file frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx is not included in the diff, indicating it may be missing or was omitted from the summary.
